name: JSON_TOOLS__GENERATE_SCHEMA
description: Generates a JSON schema from a JSON artifact using genson. The schema describes the structure and types of the JSON data.

artifact_id.description: The ID of the JSON artifact to generate a schema from. The artifact must contain valid JSON data.

schema.description: The generated JSON schema describing the structure of the JSON data

error.description: Error message if schema generation failed

name: JSON_TOOLS__QUERY_JSON
description: Queries a JSON artifact using JMESPath expressions. Allows extracting specific data from JSON structures using powerful query syntax.

artifact_id.description: The ID of the JSON artifact to query. The artifact must contain valid JSON data.

query.description: JMESPath query expression to extract data from the JSON. Examples: 'name', 'items[0].price', 'locations[?state==`CA`].city'

result.description: The result of the JMESPath query applied to the JSON data

error.description: Error message if the query failed or JSON is invalid
